text: The Paris Agreement is an agreement within the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.United Nations Climate Change, 'The Paris Agreement', https://unfccc.int/process-and-meetings/the-paris-agreement/the- paris-agreement It planned to reduce greenhouse gases. It also looked at ways countries could change to deal with problems caused by climate change, and have countries promise to spend money to make sure this would happen. The agreement was signed in Paris in 2016, by 197 countries. ==References== ==Related pages== * Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change * Kyoto Protocol Category:Treaties and Conventions Category:History of the United Nations Category:21st-century treaties
title: Paris Agreement
